definition: a fabric made of compressed matted animal fibers, change texture so as to become matted and felt-like
details:
noun
- a fabric made of compressed matted animal fibers
verb
- change texture so as to become matted and felt-like
= example: change texture so as to become matted and felt-like
= synonyms: mat
- cover with felt
= example: cover with felt
- mat together and make felt-like
= example: mat together and make felt-like
